block.p: Karen Susan Kirschenbaum, a daughter of Jerry and Marcia Kirschenbaum of Port Washington, N.Y., was married last evening to Dr. Stephen Todd Cestari, a son of Flora Jean Cestari and Dr. Robert Cestari of Rockville Centre, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Seigel officiated at Flowerfields in St. James, N.Y.

Mrs. Cestari, 27, is a clerk for Judge Shirley Wohl Kram of Federal District Court in Manhattan. She graduated from Cornell University, where she was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. She received a law degree from Harvard University.

Karen Susan Kirschenbaum, a daughter of Jerry and Marcia Kirschenbaum of Port Washington, N.Y., was married last evening to Dr. Stephen Todd Cestari, a son of Flora Jean Cestari and Dr. Robert Cestari of Rockville Centre, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Seigel officiated at Flowerfields in St. James, N.Y.

Mrs. Cestari, 27, is a clerk for Judge Shirley Wohl Kram of Federal District Court in Manhattan. She graduated from Cornell University, where she was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. She received a law degree from Harvard University.

Dr. Cestari, 29, is a second-year resident in obstetrics and gynecology at New York Downtown Hospital in Manhattan. He graduated from Tufts University and received a medical degree from New York College of Osteopathic Medicine.
